pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bottle-Tools============A set of tools to make things easier to work with when using Bottle.[Full Documentation](https://bottle-tools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)Autofill APIs with typed information```pythonimport bottle_tools as btbt.common_kwargs.update({"User": UserTable})@app.post('/calculate')@bt.fill_args(coerce_types=True)def login(usrname: str, pwd: str, User): user = User.get_or_404(usrname=usrname) if not user.password_is_correct(pwd): raise HttpNotFound() return 'ok'```
